Name: Ma Bella Cakery
Review Text: The one star is only because I have to choose one to post this review. For a place that bakes on the first floor it is a shame that the cake display is as good as empty. The red velvet cake and the chocolate brownie cake are dry and solid as a rock. What a waste of a perfectly good location. Shame.8
